name: Our Man in Havana
description: Our Man In Havana is a New York-based creative boutique offering advertising, design and digital content solutions. Our process includes the development of insight-driven, strategic platforms upon which we base all of our creative products. Our success is a result of a hands-on approach with each of us involved in all aspects of our work, we continue to punch well above our weight, creating engaging, award-winning work for clients large and small
